citations.narrative:
The coatimundi outdoor enclosure is in need of repair. Inside the enclosure there is a wooden food bowl holder that has a
large section broken off, exposing a screw and sharper edges of wood. Additionally, several of the shelves are water
logged, warped, and starting to sag, indicating a loss in structural integrity. Enclosures with sharp points and weakened
shelves can cause injury to the animal. Correct by December, 31, 2023 by ensuring all housing facilities are structurally
sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative and licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The coatimundi outdoor enclosure is in need of repair. Inside the enclosure there is a wooden food bowl holder that has a 
large section broken off, exposing a screw and sharper edges of wood. Additionally, several of the shelves are water 
logged, warped, and starting to sag, indicating a loss in structural integrity. Enclosures with sharp points and weakened 
shelves can cause injury to the animal. Correct by December, 31, 2023 by ensuring all housing facilities are structurally 
sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative and licensee. 
 
 n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
